content.raw: Note, this is only an issue if someone (oddly) adds atlas_utils as a package dependency to their package.  I had someone in my group do this, wihch is how I saw this issue.  Removing that atlas_utils dependency allows our package to build just fine, so this isn't really high priority.
content.html: Note, this is only an issue if someone (oddly) adds atlas_utils as a package dependency to their package. I had someone in my group do this, wihch is how I saw this issue. Removing that atlas_utils dependency allows our package to build just fine, so this isn't really high priority.
